title: Handaxes
content:
read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Handaxes in BG3. These Weapon Actions include Lacerate.

Battleaxes Clubs Daggers Glaives Greataxes Greatclubs Greatswords Halberds Handaxes Hand Crossbows Heavy Crossbows Javelins Light Crossbows Light Hammers Longbows Longswords Maces Mauls Morningstars Pikes Quarterstaves Rapiers Scimitars Shortbows Shortswords Sickles Spears Tridents War Picks Warhammers

All Handaxes in Baldur's
